channel.title: New Pk Server - VPS Hosted | Fight or Fear!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/TFo2QWc.png[/img][/center]
Hello guests ! Welcome to ColossusPVP, How can you make money..? do I hear you ask? Well, one of the best ways is to gear up and go fight to the death in the wilderness with our other Players on the server! That way you can earn PKP and Items Or alternatively,you can go take on the Bosses of the server, or you can Thieve the stall at home to earn some quick cash Or even kill ice queens wich drops pretty nice stuff. Our advertisement thread will show you some of the content.
WebClient link : http://colossuspvp.forumotion.co.uk/h1-webclient
Client Download: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/93kln4mplqgg7uk/NEWCLIENT.jar
Forums : http://colossuspvp.forumotion.co.uk/
-PK point system -bosses are located around the wilderness, It has a chance of PKers visiting you -Barrows -Pest Control -Decent item switches -Fight Caves - 1 Wave -DFS Spec -Awesome Pkp shops
[center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9jfdj283InA[/youtube][/center]
[center]PkP Shop 1[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/4XwK8cB.png[/img][/center]
[center]Pkp Shop 2[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/H2d9LL8.png[/img][/center]
[center]Donator Store[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/3dtQrJu.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/fBjfiMD.png[/img][/center]
[center]New Clothes[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qDLty9k.png[/img][/center]
[center]Turmoil[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/BxiGxEU.png[/img][/center]
[center]DFS Special[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/RA0WYGk.png[/img][/center]
[center]Uniques Bosses customized[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/gEKyHaz.png[/img][/center]
WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR ? DOWNLOAD NOW !
Client Download: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/93kln4mplqgg7uk/NEWCLIENT.jar

item.title: New Pk Server - VPS Hosted | Fight or Fear!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“NewColossus, post:8, topic:544822”][quote author=Revamp dis Shit link=topic=663698.msg4437097#msg4437097 date=1405451420]

VPS Hosted
Forummotion domain.

I hardly think it is vps hosted due to the fact that it has no lags even with a flood test.

Complexity = severe instability
[/quote]

I rewrote and cleared alot of shit in complexity base, its alot better and way more stable, I held 200 players with a flood test.[/quote]
“rewrote”

Read full topic
item.source: New Pk Server - VPS Hosted | Fight or Fear!

item.title: New Pk Server - VPS Hosted | Fight or Fear!
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“Blewnotes, post:3, topic:544822”][quote author=1PkingServer1 link=topic=663698.msg4436025#msg4436025 date=1405093312]
Nice server, I like customs, Growing quite fast, I consider you guys should try it out !
[/quote]

Agree’d with you, No lags, The only thing that the servers needs is players, Quite good coders, pretty active and good updates, been playing 2 days now and its quite nice and active.[/quote]
I really dislike the customs and the fact that this server is based off complexity.

Read full topic
